content.description: Lower angle problem with great crimps and friction. Excellent grippy rock.
content.protection: Stacked pads due to large "cobble" landing
content.location: Located 15 feet left of Free Pizza on the Greta boulder. This is the farthest left problem that gets a rating on the south face of this boulder.

content.description: Greta is the blunt south east arete of the large sandstone boulder on the main beach. Although Greta has been highballed, it is most often toproped.
content.location: The Greta boulder is found by walking 50 feet west(downstream) from where the trail empties onto the river bottom. It is water rounded sandstone with suprisingly good friction.

climbs.name: Greasy Little Weasel
climbs.fa: Rick Shull,Tim Fearn and Helen Shull 1998

content.description: Greasy Little Weasel starts up bulging water polished rock for the first 15 feet and pulls a slightly slippery crux and continues with fun and continuous moves to the top. This route is worth bringing a rope for, even if you plan on bouldering.
content.location: Greasy Little Weasel is located on the upstream(east) face of Memorial Rock. This is the large boulder 60 feet left of the trail as it hits the river bed. This rock has a plaque memorializing a local teen who was lost swimming during high water.

content.description: Fromage is on the Green Cheese boulder, center face.
content.location: The Green Cheese boulder is located just south and east of the Greta boulder. It faces west on the same beach as Greta.

content.description: Bulge to pocket to the top.
content.protection: Can be toproped with bolts on top or use stacked pads.
content.location: On the Greta boulder 6 feet left of Greta.

content.description: Big Loaf Man starts low on the left central face of the Big Loaf Boulder. Several crimps and slopers will take you through the first moves. It is probably easiest to campus the first couple moves until you can get your feet up and pop for the big shelf just below the true top. From there mantle up and top out.
content.protection: Several pads and an attentive spotter
content.location: The Big Loaf Boulder is located about 50-60 feet down stream from the Greta Boulder. The problems face toward the river.
